Kātiyāna’s Verses
“Rise up, sit down, Kātiyāna,
Don’t be one who sleeps a lot, stay awake;
Don’t be lazy, a friend of negligence,
So that the king of death can conquer you like a mountain.
Just as the great ocean’s current
Thus birth and aging flow on for you;
